title: Peter Holsapple, Chris Stamey, & Ilene Markell
itunes:title: Peter Holsapple, Chris Stamey, & Ilene Markell
description:
A year before they reunited on wax with 1991’s “Mavericks,” The dBs’ Peter Holsapple and Chris Stamey dropped in for a surprise appearance on “SNAP!”

Bassist Ilene Markell joined the legendary duo for a casual and breezy set that beautifully prefigured their forthcoming album.
itunes:summary:
A year before they reunited on wax with 1991’s “Mavericks,” The dBs’ Peter Holsapple and Chris Stamey dropped in for a surprise appearance on “SNAP!” 
 Bassist Ilene Markell joined the legendary duo for a casual and breezy set that beautifully prefigured their forthcoming album.
media:description: The dBs’ Peter Holsapple and Chris Stamey make a surprise reunion on “SNAP!” in July 1990, joined by bassist Ilene Markell.
author: webmaster@kcrw.org (KCRW, Tricia Halloran)
itunes:author: KCRW, Tricia Halloran
content:encoded:
A year before they reunited on wax with 1991’s “Mavericks,” The dBs’ Peter Holsapple and Chris Stamey dropped in for a surprise appearance on “SNAP!”

Bassist Ilene Markell joined the legendary duo for a casual and breezy set that beautifully prefigured their forthcoming album.
